DOC.brief_summary: The present study will analyze fecal levels of FC and FL in UC patients who relapse (flare) while on a QD or a BID Asacol treatment regimen and compare those levels to levels of FC and FL in UC patients who do not relapse (flare).
DOC.brief_title: Fecal Biomarker Study for Patients With Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Be willing and able to provide written informed consent for this biomarker study; Be enrolled in Study 2007021 (QDIEM). Meet the QDIEM Protocol 2007021 for Exclusion Criteria
